title: After School Project Partners
intro:
You walk into Ms. Chen's classroom after school to work on your science project about renewable energy. The room is quieter than usual, with only a few students scattered at different tables. Your project partner, Kai, is already there setting up materials near the window.

As you approach, you notice Elena sitting alone at a nearby table. She has books and papers spread out but keeps glancing over at you and Kai. Her usual project partner, Devon, is absent today according to the note on the whiteboard.

checkpoints.prompt: You set your backpack down and start unpacking your materials. Elena closes her textbook and walks over to your table. "Hey, I was wondering if you two might have room for one more person today? Devon's sick and I really need to get some work done on our solar panel model." Kai looks up from organizing the craft supplies and glances between you and Elena.

choices.text: Tell Elena she can definitely join your group for today's work session
Suggest Elena work at the table next to yours so you can help each other
Ask Kai what they think about Elena working with you today

checkpoints.prompt: Elena pulls up a chair and starts explaining what she and Devon have been working on. As she talks, you realize their project is very similar to yours - both groups are building models to demonstrate how solar energy works. Kai starts comparing the two approaches and points out that Elena's group has solved a problem that you and Kai have been stuck on for days.

choices.text: Propose that both groups share their different solutions and techniques
Continue working on your own project while Elena works on hers nearby

checkpoints.prompt: Ms. Chen walks over to check on everyone's progress. She notices the solar panel components spread across both tables and asks how the projects are going. Elena explains that she's been working with you and Kai today since Devon is absent. Ms. Chen nods and mentions that she's been impressed with both groups' creativity, then adds that the science fair presentation is next Friday.

choices.text: Ask Ms. Chen if there's enough time to combine both projects into one presentation
Tell Ms. Chen about the techniques you've been sharing between projects
Continue listening as Ms. Chen gives feedback on the current project designs

ending: Ms. Chen smiles and tells all three of you to keep up the excellent work. She walks back to her desk, leaving you, Kai, and Elena to continue with your projects. The afternoon sunlight streams through the classroom windows, and you can hear other students in the hallway heading home. Tomorrow Devon will be back, and you'll see how both projects turn out for the science fair next week.
